• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Celebrate the start of winter with this trendy Proline muffler with a ribbed hemline. Wrap it around your neck and let it hang loose on a windy day or simply tuck it into your coat on a cold winter day.

  • Product Details

  • Charcoal grey muffler with green and off-white accents
